Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: ngye
Reviews.Content: Just what you expect for the price i order this because we are starting to homeschool and we wanted tablets for our 4 children. We ordered this one for our 2 year old son and he loves it the only thing is that if the Wi-fi is turned on the battery drains but as long as the apps that you download can work properly with the Wi-fi off its great or if you do not mind charging it everyday. Other than that we love them

Reviews.Title: Kids Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Billetta
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these tablets for my great niece and nephew for christmas.  NEITHER OF THEM WORKED! They wouldn't even take a charge.  Sooooooooooooo disappointing for the kids.  Now I am waiting for their Mom to return them to me so that I may return them back.  Not sure if I will ever take a chance on any other electric from other vendors on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: The AGPtek kids tablet is not a high rating kids tablet please dont buy this item
Reviews.Author: Stephan J.
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for not more than one week it stopped working first the touch screen stopped working then it just showed a white screen with lines on it, it just came off and wouldn't come back on.This kids tablet just isn't good at all i heard from a few people that they bought this same tablet and the very said thing happened to theirs had i heard this before i would have never bought it,i wouldn't recommend anybody to buy it......i would really like to get a refund PLEASE asap..remember ppl DONT BUY!!

Reviews.Title: kids tablets
Reviews.Author: ashley m collins
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old son and he loves it. Decent game speed, but slow download speed. For the price it is a good deal and good for kids!

ProductInfo.Features:
One-Click play! Simplified UI: Easy to find any app you wanted. My mom and I no longer have to learn how to use the tablet.
Education for fun. Pre-install educational apps for child to learn letter, words, number, sharps¡­in a fun way!
Smooth with Games. Enable to run high requirement 3D games such as Need for Speed Hot Pursuit.
Protection. With bumper,the device is safe for dropping.Audio & eBook reader. Support eBooks and audio books. Pre-loaded kindle and iStorybook.
Worry-freeParental Control Setting time limit or managing content and apps to ensure your children have a safe, healthy and fun journal with AGPTekAbot tablet.
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® Kids Abot Tablet 7-inch Touch Screen Android 4.1 Wifi Camera Tablet PC with 32 GB TF Memory Card
